abstract: This article explores the opportunities and challenges for dentists in the transition to electronic health records (EHRs). Dentists have been slowed in the digital transition by lack of federal incentives and technical assistance. Now, however, changes in the practice of dentistry, including more integration with other health care providers, may propel them forward.

citations.title: An Enhanced Concept based Approach for user Centered Health Information Retrieval to Address Readability Issues
citations.venue: International Journal of Advanced Computer Science and Applications

citations.title: Adoption of Electronic Dental Records: Examining the Influence of Practice Characteristics on Adoption in One State
Perceived critical success factors of electronic health record system implementation in a dental clinic context: An organisational management perspective

title: Are Electronic Health Records the Future of Dental Practice?
